greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (a(n-1) * a(n-3) - (-1)^n * a(n-2)^2) / a(n-4) with a(0) = 0, a(1) = ... = a(4) = 1.
comment: This is similar to Somos-4 (A006720) except for the alternating coefficient of a(n-2)^2.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
formula: a(n) = a(-n), a(2*n) = A178384(n)^2 for all n in Z.
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 1, 1, 1]; [0] cat [n le 4 select I[n] else ( Self(n-1)*Self(n-3) - (-1)^n*Self(n-2)^2 )/Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 05 2018
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 14 2014
